channel.title: Invisible Items
channel.description: Well i have recently added a new weapon, and i found that it was partially invisible from certain angles. Seen many help requests for this problem, not one answered. If you can, please help. Thanks

item.title: Invisible Items
item.dc:creator: @rune_sleep rune_sleep
item.description:
@rune_sleep wrote:

[quote=“Ziege Terra 117, post:2, topic:283354”]I don’t think there is any way to change it, unfortunately.

Like with Vesta’s Longsword, from a certain angle half the sword is invisible…

But no I don’t think there is a way to fix it.[/quote]

Well i have been on the Runescape Admin Job for about 3 Years Right if you look at a skill cape on a certain angle the skill-cape is messed up so theres no way to fix it with out disabling the 3D.

So You cant fix the invisbale Item Sorry.

Tryed to help you

Read full topic

item.title: Invisible Items
item.dc:creator: @Ziege_Terra_117 Ziege Terra 117
item.description:
@Ziege_Terra_117 wrote:

I don’t think there is any way to change it, unfortunately.

Like with Vesta’s Longsword, from a certain angle half the sword is invisible…

But no I don’t think there is a way to fix it.

Read full topic
